name: thedailybeast
text: Dr. Anthony Fauci had some unusually harsh words for both Fox News and President Trump’s new coronavirus adviser Dr. Scott Atlas in a new interview with CNN’s media reporter Brian Stelter https://t.co/EuBMUe439R

name: thedailybeast
text: A Texas sheriff has been charged with tampering with evidence in the case of Black man whose death while in police custody was caught on camera by the controversial reality TV show Live PD https://t.co/efrwaLernM

name: thedailybeast
text: EXCLUSIVE: The recent layoffs at Fox News signal what current and former employees describe as the purposeful devaluing of fact-based journalism in favor of right-wing opinion, race-baiting and conspiracy-mongering at the Trump-friendly cable outlet https://t.co/avHf9xNUTI

name: thedailybeast
text: Layoffs cut most deeply into the channel’s straight-news operations at Fox News Digital and elsewhere, according to insiders, while protecting “Fox & Friends” and Trump cheerleaders Tucker Carlson, Sean Hannity, and Laura Ingraham in primetime https://t.co/5AlAfVr3d1

name: thedailybeast
text: Sources say the outlet’s “Brain Room,” which the late Roger Ailes established as the 24-year-old channel’s fact-checking and research unit, has been especially hard-hit, losing around one-fourth of its 30-person staff—a virtual frontal lobotomy https://t.co/5AlAfVr3d1

name: thedailybeast
text: Along with the painful layoffs, fired employees—worried about getting new jobs amid the COVID-19 pandemic—are being forced to sign severance agreements that include draconian non-disclosure requirements in order to receive their severance packages https://t.co/5AlAfVr3d1

name: thedailybeast
text: Read the full exclusive by @dianafalzone and @TheLloydGrove here: https://t.co/5AlAfVr3d1

name: thedailybeast
text: Burgess Owens, the Republican running for Utah’s tight 4th Congressional District race, appeared this week on an obscure right-wing podcast that has openly aligned itself with QAnon views https://t.co/LyTHhdY8nK
